extractions.extraction_text: Overview of Popular Data Analysis Algorithms

This chapter provides an overview of popular data analysis algorithms, categorizing them into data mining and machine learning. Data mining algorithms are grouped into classification, clustering, correlation analysis, and anomaly detection. Machine learning algorithms are divided into supervised learning (including regression and classification), unsupervised learning (including clustering and dimensionality reduction), semi-supervised learning (including self-training models), and reinforcement learning (including dynamic programming). The chapter will explain eight specific algorithms: Linear Regression, k-means Clustering, k-nearest neighbor, Naive Bayes, Apriori, Support Vector Machine, Convolutional Neural Network (CNN), and Principal Component Analysis (PCA).
data analysis, data mining, machine learning, supervised learning, unsupervised learning, classification, clustering, Linear Regression, K-means Clustering, Principal Component Analysis

attributes.definition: A category of big data processing algorithms that can be grouped into classification, clustering, correlation analysis, and anomaly detection.
A category of big data processing algorithms that include supervised learning, unsupervised learning, semi-supervised learning, and reinforcement learning.
A type of machine learning that includes regression, classification, and deep learning.
A type of machine learning that includes clustering, dimensionality reduction, and anomaly detection.
A type of machine learning that includes self-training and low-density separation models.
A type of machine learning that includes dynamic programming and Monte Carlo methods.

text:
Hello everyone, I am Haiying Che, from Institute of Data Science and knowledge Engineering
School of Computer Science, in Beijing Institute of Technology, In this chapter we will learn some popular algorithms of data analysis
Generally Big data processing algorithm basically include data mining algorithms and Machine learning algorithms.
Data mining algorithms can be categorized into 4 groups, classification, clustering, correlation Analysis and anomaly detection.
Machine learning algorithms include supervised learning, unsupervised learning, semi-supervised learning and reinforcement learning.
And in the scope of supervised learning there are regression, classification, and deep learning.
And in the scope of unsupervised learning there are clustering, dimensionality reduction, and anomaly detection.
For semi-supervised learning, it includes self-training and low-density separation models.
and reinforcement learning include dynamic programming and Monte Carlo methods.
In this chapter we will explain 8 popular algorithms, include Linear Regression, k-means Clustering, k-nearest neighbor, Naive Bayes algorithm, Apriori algorithm, Support Vector Machine, Convolutional Neural Network, Principal Component Analysis. 
And we will use the Youtube videos to explain the algorithms which is with more animation and easier to understand.
In this session, we will learn Linear Regression algorithm.
In this session, we will learn K-means Clustering algorithm.
In this session, we will learn K-nearest neighbor algorithm.
In this session, we will learn Naive Bayes algorithm.
In this session, we will learn Apriori algorithm.
In this session, we will learn Support Vector Machine.
In this session, we will learn Convolutional Neural Network,CNN.
In this session, we will learn Principal Component Analysis PCA.
In all this chapter we learned the popular algorithms of data analysis
Thank you for your attention and if you have any question, feel free to contact me.
